name: 陳怡倩
objective: 本課程分為兩部分：（1）英文文法觀念的溫故知新，並引導學生將正確的文法觀念運用在閱讀與寫作上，學生可加強基本句型練習、句子改正及句型修正。相關討論包括直述句、引述句、句型變化與修飾;（2）英語修辭法：聽講溝通的有效原理原則。課堂討論主題包括：指稱、一致、倒裝等修辭觀念。修習本課後，學生對出現在相同邏輯意義語境中， 利用不同表達方式以凸顯各種語意的方式與內涵，當有更進一步的體認。
schedule:
Week 1 Course Introduction 
Week 2 Parts of Speech I & II
Week 3 Parts of Speech III
Week 4 Parts of Speech III cont.
Week 5 Parts of Speech IV 
Week 6 Parts of Speech V & VI
Week 7 Parts of Speech VII & VIII
Week 8 Review of Parts of Speech 
Week 9 Mid-term
Week 10 Review of Mid-term Exam
Week 11 Sentences
Week 12 Adverbial Clauses
Week 13 Adjective Clauses
Week 14 Noun Clauses
Week 15 Participial Phrases; Gerund Phrases; Infinitive Phrases
Week 16 Review
Week 17 New Year's Day (no class)
Week 18 Final Exam
scorePolicy: Attendance & active participation (15%); pop quizzes (20%); mid-term (30%); final (35%).
materials:
Frank, Marcella. (2003). Modern English Part I: Exercises for Non-native Speakers of English. Taipei, Taiwan: Pearson Education Taiwan.
Frank, Maecella. (2003) Modern English Part II: Sentences & Complex Structures (2nd). Taipei, Taiwan: Pearson Education Taiwan.
